author: Saph

review: Shortly after purchasing the Google Chromecast 10 new apps were added to the catalog increasing its value exponentially. I hope to have an app that can share virtually everything from my PC/Mac, but apps like Plex and Avia do a decent job streaming protected media through my network. For the price of this little device it's unbeatable, turning any TV or monitor with an HDMI port into a smart TV it sorts. I adore this little technological marvel.
author: S. Graham

review: Great idea but still limited functionality.  I anticipate more programs and options will be added.  That is all that is needed to make it a great product instead of the promising product it now is.
author: Montague Dixon

review: I love Google products/services and was excited to try this out.  Unfortunately, my router is about 50ft from the TV where I tried this and Chromecast could not connect to the router.  This same TV has a Wii connected wirelessly to internet and works fine so I think the issue is more with Chromecast.  I read online that Chromecast needs to be within 20ft of router which I think is too short a distance for most homes.
author: David I

review: Do not waste your money on other devices that cost many more fold that perform similar functions. The Chromecast is a device with expanding ability, and you will love using your existing products are remotes for your HD television. Easy to set up, and easy to use.
My son talked me into buying this, as I had no idea what it could do. But, I am very happy to have it. Very handy little gadget!
author: Sandra Strain

review: I bought tow and one turned out to be factory defective.No means to reinstall  firmware and clean reset. Limited to streaming few apps.
author: Zafer Rasim

review: Product arrived on time as promised. Well packaged. Bought 2. One was for my son . Have now ordered a 3rd one for another large TV in the house. Excellent product with a great price for what it does. We have 1 of the major dish networks and they will not allow us to stream Netflix as it is in direct competition to what they offer at a much higher price. I highly recommend this product.
author: Amazon Customer
